synopsis.text: Umi Asanagi, the second most admired girl in school, and Maki Maehara, a solitary high school student, find an unlikely friendship in each other. Despite Asanagi's popularity and Maehara's struggle to connect with others, they discover a shared love for movies, games, and manga. Every Friday, Asanagi chooses to forgo her plans with Yuu Amami, the most admired girl in school, to spend time with Maehara. In the comfort of Maehara's home, they indulge in junk food, watch movies, and immerse themselves in manga, creating a cherished, secret world of their own. As they grow closer, the line between friendship and something more begins to blur, leaving Maehara questioning the nature of their relationship. Will this secret friendship remain as it is, or will it evolve into something more? Join Maehara and Asanagi on their journey of self-discovery, friendship, and love in this heartwarming anime.
